00044 typedef struct ScanFillContext
00045 {
00046     ListBase fillvertbase;
00047     ListBase filledgebase;
00048     ListBase fillfacebase;
00049 
00050     /* simple optimization for allocating thousands of small memory blocks
00051      * only to be used within loops, and not by one function at a time
00052      * free in the end, with argument '-1'
00053      */
00054 #define MEM_ELEM_BLOCKSIZE 16384
00055     struct mem_elements *melem__cur;
00056     int melem__offs;                   /* the current free address */
00057     ListBase melem__lb;
00058 
00059     /* private */
00060     struct ScanFillVertLink *_scdata;
00061 } ScanFillContext;
00062 
00063 /* note; changing this also might affect the undo copy in editmesh.c */
00064 typedef struct ScanFillVert
00065 {
00066     struct ScanFillVert *next, *prev;
00067     union {
00068         struct ScanFillVert *v;
00069         void                *p;
00070         intptr_t             l;
00071     } tmp;
00072     float co[3]; /* vertex location */
00073     float xy[2]; /* 2D copy of vertex location (using dominant axis) */
00074     int keyindex; /* original index #, for restoring  key information */
00075     short poly_nr;
00076     unsigned char f, h;
00077 } ScanFillVert;
00078 
00079 typedef struct ScanFillEdge
00080 {
00081     struct ScanFillEdge *next, *prev;
00082     struct ScanFillVert *v1, *v2;
00083     short poly_nr;
00084     unsigned char f;
00085 } ScanFillEdge;
00086 
00087 typedef struct ScanFillFace
00088 {
00089     struct ScanFillFace *next, *prev;
00090     struct ScanFillVert *v1, *v2, *v3;
00091 } ScanFillFace;
